Episode.Overview: A look back at the making of Come Fly With Me. Go behind the scenes as Lucas and Williams create and develop Come Fly With Me and follow the trials and tribulations as they bring to life a host of new characters, whilst filming at one of the UK's busiest airports. Featuring an in depth interview with Mark Lawson.
